channel.title: Creating on Mirantibus
channel.description: Recent content in Creating on Mirantibus

item.title: Aethra.
item.description: On a sunny day, earlier this year, I left my flat and headed into town. This had become somewhat of a routine for me; go into the town centre, grab a drink and go for a stroll. It keeps me happy. I sat down in the kind of chain caf√® that only really exists in the UK and took out the book I had been reading. “We are Bellingcat” by Elliot Higgins is an almost autobiographical book that explains how Higgins and a growing group of followers and friends started Bellingcat and created the ever-growing field of Open Source Intelligence or OSINT.
